sentences.english: The Rose pink clay will make the skin feel fresh and moisturized.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰粉泥将使面部的肌肤倍感滋润和清新。

sentences.english: His face scrunches up. He begins to cry.
sentences.chinese: 哈雷一言未发，他的面部扭曲着，开始哭泣。

sentences.english: I practiced facial expressions, and I snarled like a wolf.
sentences.chinese: 我练习面部表情，方法是学习狼嚎。

sentences.english: Objective To observe and summarize the therapeutic effects of maxillofacial hemangioma in chlidren.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察和总结颌面部血管瘤的治疗效果。

sentences.english: This glimmering rose bronze facial glow gives your complexion a warm, delicate sheen.
sentences.chinese: 这荧玫瑰铜像面部辉光让你的肤色温暖，微妙的光泽。

sentences.english: Also it is very helpful for lady's facial and spa treatment.
sentences.chinese: 同时它是非常有用的治疗夫人的面部和温泉浴场。

sentences.english: Face, root, and side bend , Reduced section.
Facial features are distorted in pain.
Cause skin deep abscess formation, affecting facial appearance.

sentences.english: As you use it, facial contours appear sculpted and newly defined.
sentences.chinese: 当你使用它，出现面部轮廓雕塑和新定义。

sentences.english: This vision who can see people straight face?
sentences.chinese: 谁有这眼力能从面部直看到人心？

sentences.english: Breast stuck his bottom at the same time, it will certainly be accompanied by facial fullness.
sentences.chinese: 丰乳翘臀的同时，一定会随同这面部的丰满。

sentences.english: Helmed visors with a leonine head for a crest hid the features of their captors.
sentences.chinese: 用狮头作装饰的头盔隐藏了他们的逮捕者的面部特征。

sentences.english: Cervical skin texture and what differs facially?
sentences.chinese: 颈部肌肤结构与面部的有什么不同？

sentences.english: Objective To find a way for finer lower face re-contouring.
sentences.chinese: 目的为探寻更精细的下面部轮廓整形方法。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, surgeons carried out the operation to rebuild his face.
sentences.chinese: 两周后，外科医生实施了手术以复原他的面部。
